description: This file contains unit tests for the 'FrameType' template class in the WPEFramework Core, utilizing Google Test framework. It tests buffer setting, copying, size, and other operations related to FrameType objects.

classes.name: FrameType
classes.description: A template class representing a data frame with buffer management capabilities.

methods.name: SetBuffer
methods.description: Sets the buffer content starting at a specific offset.

methods.name: GetBuffer
methods.description: Retrieves buffer data from a specific offset.

methods.name: Size
methods.description: Gets or sets the size of the FrameType.

methods.name: Clear
methods.description: Clears the content of the FrameType.

methods.name: UnlockBuffer
methods.description: Releases the buffer lock at a given position.
